decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable

Class RAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable.RSprite
      • decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable.RAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasRenderableManager, Renderable

    public class RAnimation
extends RSprite
    Created by wangyufei on 14-8-25. This Renderable is used to draw the animated object e.g. Tree It will ask for the new texture in the update method.
